group_1.textLeft: Yep, that's my dream...@To become a fashion designer!

group_1.textRight: Then I will make your dream come true.

group_1.textLeft: No, no, wait! Stop!@Don't do it!

group_1.textRight: ...But why?@You don't want to become a fashion designer?

group_1.textLeft: I too want do!
I mean I DO want to!@[chara:300101:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]I want it so bad I can't talk right!
No, that's wrong!
Let's not get into all that!
The thing is, I want to make it happen@on my own!
If you make it happen through a miracle @or something, I feel like it won't go right.
I feel like I saw a movie or read a manga@that was talking about that.
So I want to make it with my own talent!@That's a must!

group_1.textRight: So you don't need me, then?

group_1.textLeft: I do need you!
...There are certain problems that I can't@solve just by will alone.

group_1.textRight: So the wish that you want granted is...

group_1.textLeft: That's right!@You hit the nail on the head!
Right! You solve them for me!@With your miracles!
But the thing is, I'm kinda struggling@over how the problems should be solved.

group_1.textRight: Okay. I'll come back after @you've thought some more.

group_1.textLeft: Wait! Wait!@Don't go yet!
I feel like if you go away, @I may never see you again!

group_1.textRight: If you make up your mind, I'll come @back and see you at any time.

group_1.textLeft: But I...@I always trust my intuition!

group_1.textRight: All right. @What's the problem you're struggling with?

group_1.textLeft: I guess...@Maybe we could think it over together?
The problem...well it's with my family...
